variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for Newfoundland and Labrador 2025 tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 8.7% on the portion of income up to $44,192. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 14.5% on the portion of income over $44,192 up to $88,382. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 15.8% on the portion of income over $88,382 up to $157,792. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 17.8% on the portion of income over $157,792 up to $220,910. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 19.8% on the portion of income over $220,910 up to $282,214. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 20.8% on the portion of income over $282,214 up to $564,429. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_7
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 7: 21.3% on the portion of income over $564,429 up to $1,128,858. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_8
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 8: 21.8% on the portion of income over $1,128,858. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_8 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all eight brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
